tags: None
review:
Dentist mam has given me treatment of RCT , teeth filling & cleaning . After going all this treatment I must say she is excellent in her work and has good knowledge of the field . The good thing about her she deals with the problem so causally and with a smile that helps patient to have some confident on the work will be done great .
Staff members of the clinic also good in behaviour and cooperated with me so decently .
I will definately look to this clinic in future if required

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Barman has been very caring and patient and properly explained everything in detail for my dental treatment. Her support staff is also friendly and supportive which gave me lot of assurance. I'm very satisfied with the treatment and care. I would certainly recommend her for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am elated with the treatment provided by Dr. Sawon Barman and her team. They take utmost care to fill in the requirements. She also explains all the possible treatment for a particular problem with pros and cons of all. Thankful for the dental filling!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was great to see how much Dr Barman likes to do the procedures correctly rather than hurrying through the process. 
I had some dental procedures before with other doctors but this RCT process with Dr Barman was the best experience I had. 
I had a great experience and would like to recommend her to others as well.

tags: Value for money,
review:
I had my Widom Tooth Extraction surgery and RCT here.
I reveived good treatment but it's very costly . Any treatment you take would be 3-4x more costly so be prepared. Also, you may have to pay on every visits even after paying for any major treatmemt.
Apart from Doctor , the other folks here in the clinic are also very friendly and provides useful information.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a wonderful experience with the Doctor, she is very friendly and will explain to you whatever you want to know.Also, I would like to mention that the lady who helps the doctor is also very very friendly. She will ease all your tension.Doctor will assist you in all possible ways , she never fails to reply in WhatsApp being in such a busy schedule.I would highly highly highly recommend Doctor Sawan Barman to each and every body

tags: None
review: Doctor was not helpful either. She took a x-ray of my tooth and send it to me thorugh whatsapp but not in the chamber, she gave me that x-ray after leaving the chamber. She was tring to take sacling or polishing of mine but I was not prepared to take it because she want to charge of Rs. 3000/-. That's why I was not agree to this and left. That's why she gave me half of the x-ray, not full x-ray. My experience is very bad with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor S Barman and other staffs are very friendly and cooperative. I Had a great experience there. I was suffering with several dental problems from more than a year. Doctor explains very well all the procedures. And doctor does not hurry up, she is very much professional and do things in right way. I would recommend this clinic and doctor to all others.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was initially very worried and anxious about the rct treatment.. And was superstitious about the things that it will hurt a lot.. However, soon the doctor's friendly demeanor and patience helped me get over my anxiety and get done with my rct.. It was infact almost painless.. And the doctor also took special care, taking my age and the fact that i had never gotten a rct before in attention. I would like to reach out to the doctor , if dental related problems transpire in future.

tags: None
review: She took 2500 fo scaling, which she haven’t conducted herself, and I paid 300 for xray and then she said 9 teeth have cavity but she have sent pic of 3 teeth.

review: I went to the clinic because of my painful wisdom teeth of upper right side. The Doctor Sawon Barman examined and suggested to extraction the tooth and explained why its important. I was really scared about that but she handled it nicely . No pain even after extraction .I really satisfied for my issues.
